fields.description:
FB Voltage Regulation Limit:
POR: 1536mV (10h)
Range: 1504mV-1566mV (0h-1Fh)
Bit Step: 2mV
Offset: 1504mV
fields.name: VFB_REG

fields.description:
Fast Charge Current Regulation Limit with 5mΩ RBAT_SNS:
Actual charge current is the lower of ICHG_REG and ICHG pin
POR: 20000mA (190h)
Range: 400mA-20000mA (8h-190h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 50mA
fields.name: ICHG_REG

fields.description:
Input Current DPM Regulation Limit with 5mΩ RAC_SNS:
Actual input current limit is the lower of IAC_DPM and ILIM_HIZ pin
POR: 20000mA (190h)
Range: 400mA-20000mA (8h-190h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 50mA
fields.name: IAC_DPM

fields.description:
Input Voltage Regulation Limit:
Note if EN_MPPT = 1, the Full Sweep method will use this limit as the lower search window for Full Panel Sweep
POR: 4200mV (D2h)
Range: 4200mV-65000mV (D2h-CB2h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 20mV
fields.name: VAC_DPM

fields.description:
Input Current Regulation in Reverse Mode with 5mΩ RAC_SNS:
POR: 20000mA (190h)
Range: 400mA-20000mA (8h-190h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 50mA
fields.name: IAC_REV

fields.description:
VAC Voltage Regulation in Reverse Mode:
POR: 5000mV (FAh)
Range: 3300mV-65000mV (A5h-CB2h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 20mV
fields.name: VAC_REV

fields.description:
Pre-charge current regulation limit with 5mΩ RBAT_SNS:
POR: 4000mA (50h)
Range: 250mA-10000mA (5h-C8h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 50mA
fields.name: IPRECHG

fields.description:
Termination Current Threshold with 5mΩ RBAT_SNS:
POR: 2000mA (28h)
Range: 250mA-10000mA (5h-C8h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 50mA
fields.name: ITERM

fields.description: Battery threshold for PRECHG to FASTCHG transition, as percentage of VFB_REG:
fields.name: VBAT_LOWV

fields.description: Enable pre-charge and trickle charge functions:
fields.name: EN_PRECHG

fields.description: Charge safety timer speed in DPM:

digital_physical_map.1: Timer slowed by 2x during input DPM

fields.name: EN_TMR2X

fields.description: Battery auto-recharge threshold, as percentage of VFB_REG:
fields.name: VRECHG

digital_physical_map.1: Reset (bit goes back to 0 after timer reset)

fields.description: Controls the EN_CHG bit behavior when WATCHDOG expires:
fields.name: EN_CHG_BIT_RESET_BEHAVIOR

fields.description:
CE_STAT4 pin override:
Can only be forced on if DIS_CE_PIN = 1
fields.name: FORCE_STAT4_ON

fields.description:
PG_STAT3 pin override:
Can only be forced on if DIS_PG_PIN = 1
fields.name: FORCE_STAT3_ON

fields.description:
STAT2 pin override:
Can only be forced on if DIS_STAT_PINS = 1
fields.name: FORCE_STAT2_ON

fields.description:
STAT1 pin override:
Can only be forced on if DIS_STAT_PINS = 1
fields.name: FORCE_STAT1_ON

digital_physical_map.1: Reset (bit goes back to 0 after register reset)

fields.description:
Enable PFM mode in light-load:
Note this bit is reset upon a valid SYNC signal detection on FSW_SYNC pin. Host can set this bit back to 1 to force PFM operation even with a valid SYNC input
fields.name: EN_PFM

fields.description: Force Full Panel Sweep and reset MPPT timers:

digital_physical_map.1: Start Full Panel Sweep (bit goes back to 0 after Full Panel Sweep complete)

fields.name: FORCE_SWEEP

fields.description: JEITA Warm (T3 < TS < T5) regulation voltage setting, as percentage of VFB_REG:
fields.name: JEITA_VSET

fields.description: JEITA Warm (T3 < TS < T5) regulation current setting, as percentage of ICHG_REG:
fields.name: JEITA_ISETH

fields.description: JEITA Cool (T1 < TS < T2) regulation current setting, as percentage of ICHG_REG:
fields.name: JEITA_ISETC

fields.description: TS pin function control (applies to forward charging and reverse discharging modes):
fields.name: EN_TS

fields.description: Reverse Mode TS HOT temperature threshold control:
fields.name: BHOT

fields.description: Reverse Mode TS COLD temperature threshold control:
fields.name: BCOLD

fields.description:
Input Voltage for Max Power Point detected:
POR: 0mV (0h)
Range: 0mV-60000mV (0h-BB8h)
Clamped High
Bit Step: 20mV
fields.name: VAC_MPP

fields.description: ADC conversion status (in one-shot mode only):
fields.name: ADC_DONE_STAT

digital_physical_map.1: In Input Current regulation (ILIM pin or IAC_DPM)
In Input Voltage regulation (VAC_DPM or VSYS_REV)

fields.description: Max Power Point Tracking Algorithm status:
fields.name: MPPT_STAT

digital_physical_map.1: DRV_SUP pin voltage is out of valid range

fields.description:
ADC conversion INT flag (in one-shot mode only):
Note: always reads 0 in continuous mode
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: ADC_DONE_FLAG

Input Current regulation INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: IAC_DPM_FLAG

I2C Watchdog timer INT flag:

CV timer INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)

digital_physical_map.1: CV timer expired rising edge detected

fields.name: CV_TMR_FLAG

Charge cycle INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)

digital_physical_map.1: CHARGE_STAT[2:0] bits changed (transition to any state)

fields.name: CHARGE_FLAG

fields.description:
Input Power Good INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: PG_FLAG

fields.description:
TS (Battery NTC) INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)

digital_physical_map.1: TS_STAT[2:0] bits changed (transitioned to any state)

fields.name: TS_FLAG

fields.description:
Reverse Mode INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: REVERSE_FLAG

fields.description:
FSW_SYNC pin signal INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: FSW_SYNC_FLAG

fields.description:
Max Power Point Tracking INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)

digital_physical_map.1: MPPT_STAT[1:0] bits changed (transitioned to any state)

fields.name: MPPT_FLAG

fields.description:
Input under-voltage INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: VAC_UV_FLAG

fields.description:
Input over-voltage INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: VAC_OV_FLAG

fields.description:
Battery over-current INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: IBAT_OCP_FLAG

fields.description:
Battery over-voltage INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: VBAT_OV_FLAG

fields.description:
Thermal shutdown INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: TSHUT_FLAG

Charge safety timer INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)

digital_physical_map.1: Charge Safety timer expired rising edge detected

fields.name: CHG_TMR_FLAG

fields.description:
DRV_SUP pin voltage INT flag:
Access: R (ClearOnRead)
fields.name: DRV_OKZ_FLAG

fields.description: ADC conversion INT mask (in one-shot mode only):

digital_physical_map.1: ADC_DONE does not produce INT pulse

fields.name: ADC_DONE_MASK

digital_physical_map.1: IAC_DPM_FLAG does not produce INT pulse
VAC_DPM_FLAG does not produce INT pulse
WD expiration does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: CV Timer expired rising edge produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: CV Timer expired rising edge does not produce INT pulse
CHARGE_STAT change does not produces INT pulse
PG toggle does not produce INT pulse
TS_STAT change does not produce INT pulse
REVERSE_STAT toggle does no produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: FSW_SYNC status change produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: FSW_SYNC status change does not produce INT pulse

fields.description: Max Power Point Tracking INT mask:

digital_physical_map.0: MPPT_STAT rising edge produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: MPPT_STAT rising edge does no produce INT pulse

fields.name: MPPT_MASK

digital_physical_map.0: Input under-voltage event produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: Input under-voltage event does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: Input over-voltage event produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: Input over-voltage event does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: Battery over-current event produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: Battery over-current event does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: Battery over-voltage event produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: Battery over-voltage event does not produce INT pulse
TSHUT event does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: Timer expired rising edge produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: Timer expired rising edge does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: DRV_SUP pin fault produces INT pulse
digital_physical_map.1: DRV_SUP pin fault does not produce INT pulse

digital_physical_map.0: Start average using existing register value
digital_physical_map.1: Start average using new ADC conversion

fields.description:
VFB ADC control
Recommend to disable this channel when charging is enabled
fields.name: VFB_ADC_DIS

fields.description:
IAC ADC reading with 5mΩ RAC_SNS:
Reported as 2s complement
POR: 0mA(0h)
Format: 2s Complement
Range: -20000mA - 20000mA (9E58h-61A8h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 0.8mA
fields.name: IAC_ADC

fields.description:
IBAT ADC reading with 5mΩ RBAT_SNS:
Reported as 2s complement
POR: 0mA (0h)
Format: 2s Complement
Range: -20000mA-20000mA (D8F0h-2710h)
Clamped Low
Clamped High
Bit Step: 2mA
fields.name: IBAT_ADC

fields.description:
VAC ADC reading:
Reported as unsigned integer
POR: 0mV (0h)
Format: 2s Complement
Range: 0mV-65534mV (0h-7FFFh)
Clamped Low
Bit Step: 2mV
fields.name: VAC_ADC

fields.description:
VBAT ADC reading:
Reported as unsigned integer
POR: 0mV (0h)
Format: 2s Complement
Range: 0mV-65534mV (0h-7FFFh)
Clamped Low
Bit Step: 2mV
fields.name: VBAT_ADC

fields.description:
TS ADC reading as percentage of REGN:
Reported as unsigned integer
POR: 0%(0h)
Range: 0% - 99.90234375% (0h-3FFh)
Clamped High
Bit Step: 0.09765625%
fields.name: TS_ADC

fields.description:
VFB ADC reading:
POR: 0mV (0h)
Range: 0mV-2047mV (0h-7FFh)
Clamped High
Bit Step: 1mV
fields.name: VFB_ADC

fields.name: BOOST_DEAD_TIME

fields.name: BUCK_DEAD_TIME

fields.name: IBAT_REV

fields.name: EN_CONV_FAST_TRANSIENT
